definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
the sidereal year (astronomy)/the year defined in terms of the fixed stars

sentences.english: Stars are also classified by their luminosity under the Morgan-Keenan system.
sentences.chinese: 恒星在MK系统下，也经常根据光度分类。

sentences.english: Stars create these elements and spew them into space.
sentences.chinese: 恒星产生这些元素并将其散布到太空中。

sentences.english: The constellation Vulpecula is a veritable entire assembly line of newborn stars.
sentences.chinese: 整个狐狸星座是一条真正新生恒星的组装线。

sentences.english: Obviously, a line of astroid nebula is a result which the star old age evolves.
sentences.chinese: 可见，行星状星云是恒星晚年演化的结果。

sentences.english: These stars form from protostars in just 10,000 to 100,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这些恒星只花1万到10万年就结束了原恒星阶段。

sentences.english: These stars form from protostars in just 10,000 to 100,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这些恒星只花1万到10万年就结束了原恒星阶段。

sentences.english: External layers of the star are forced outwards, drifting through space for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 恒星的外层被迫向外扩张，在太空中漂移数千年。

sentences.english: And then the nearest star will be less than five years voyaging from the earth.［514 words］
sentences.chinese: 那时，离地球最近的恒星用不了5年就可以到达。

sentences.english: Our galaxy's core is a frenzied place, and identifying baby stars there has been difficult.
sentences.chinese: 银心是一个混乱的区域，从中辨识出早期恒星很难。

sentences.english: The brightest reddish stars in the cluster are ancient red giants.
sentences.chinese: 星团中最明亮的微红色恒星是远古的红巨星。

sentences.english: Stars are forming within the dark cloud.
sentences.chinese: 恒星正在该暗星云中形成。

sentences.english: Nibiru was described as a star by the ancient Babylonian astronomers.
sentences.chinese: Nibiru被古代巴比伦天文学家描述成一颗恒星。

sentences.english: If the stellar spectrum is known, the albedo of the dust can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 如果恒星的光谱已知，就可得出尘埃的反照率。

sentences.english: Ultraviolet radiation from the hot star powers the nebular glow.
sentences.chinese: 热恒星的紫外辐射使星云发光。

sentences.english: Starsmay not be loners, as once thought.
sentences.chinese: 恒星可能并不像此前所认为的那样是一个“孤独者”。

sentences.english: All stars balance gravity with pressure.
sentences.chinese: 所有的恒星的重力都与其压力相平衡。
